metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36394 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: pam_setquota.c in the pam_setquota module before 2020-05-29 for Linux-PAM allows local attackers to set their quota on an arbitrary filesystem, in certain situations where the attacker's home directory is a FUSE filesystem mounted under /home.

criterions.comment: pam: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
